name: Galaxy Swarm
description:
Fly through waves of enemy ships, collecting power-ups to boost your ship. Tilt to steer, touch the screen to activate your shield. How many waves can you survive? No ads! No in app purchases - just retro-style arcade shoot'em-up action with stunning 3D graphics.

Controls:

Tilt to swerve left and right as well as move forward and backward.

Touch the screen to activate your shield - there is only limited energy - so use it wisely!

Hint - hold your device facing you as the space ship calibrates - ensure the phone is not completely vertical or steering will be more difficult.

Features:

Rapid difficulty progression
Roguelike enemy generation and powerup drops
Exciting powerups that complement each other
Great replayability with each swarm wave 
Challenging bosses
Local high score table
Game over screen shows detailed stats of your run
Share high scores with friends
Smooth gameplay
Immersive sound
One low price
